name: Jemmy
blurb: Data courier. Vent-crawler. Password whisperer. He steals from big cats only.

name: Don Drakely
blurb: AM-wave anarchist. His voice breaks radios and rules.

name: Stefan Griffel
blurb: Childlike CEO of BrainBaby™. World domination via educational apps.

name: Flintnova
blurb: VR quarry boss. Mines nostalgia, sells souvenirs.

name: Stanley Bobberson
blurb: Happiness developer. Programs joy into gloomy servers.
